name: disreputably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is likely to lead to someone not being trusted or respected, or being considered morally bad: We have seen a lot of stories of people acting disreputably. See
disreputable
More examplesFewer examplesThe media have behaved disreputably in this.He specializes in disreputably thrilling entertainment.The majority of operators are working legally but a minority are working disreputably. A paramedic acted "disreputably" by failing to properly treat a diabetic woman who collapsed, it was claimed.
